answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I recently answered a question very similar to this. I have included the link to that question below where you can find a list of sample programs.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/21275/Outstanding_Citizen_award_program
I hope this helps!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Gregory Stopka
text: There is an Alliance member starting a new Outstanding Citizen Recognition Program. They are wondering what are some of the best practices from other cities to compare.
title: Outstanding Citizen Recognition Program
